entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 29. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 29. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 22.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 28 in the evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 16 February 2023
